TopicTitle: How did you choose your profile picture?

Articles.Content:
How did you choose your profile picture, did you just like it, does it fit with the name or what?

also, what is your profile picture?

I change my profile picture very often, so if you are readimg this a few days or weeks in the future, you might get confused.

My current profile picture is of my fictional space nation. Not getting into detail to respect 2.2b

Well. This was a really hard choice.
I have spent a lot of time searching any.
But at last it happened. Here it is.
Haha
I liked the style of Thomas P.'s profile pic, but I wanted it in the style of a white and blue star.
The idea of letting Jeb have a lightsaber just makes me laugh...
Mine's a picture of Jet Jaguar, a giant, flying, Ultraman-like robot from the movie "Godzilla vs. Megalon".  Jet Jaguar is my standard online name, and I always use the same avatar.
Mine is the logo of the 21st Space Wing. I decided that would be a cool thing to have as an avatar...

Uh...

 

self explanatory?

The twin A.I. spirit sisters of Fraxinus airship in Date a Live series. ARS is my nickname, and the twin sisters are known as Arusu (Ars) sisters (The white one is Ars Maria, the black one is Ars Marina), so they are pretty much an icon of my nickname
It's a photo of me. Honest.
I will change it to a picture of Minmus.
It's probably self explanatory.
Yeah. Funny sig.
My YouTube logo. No real story behind it.

Wait. V is 5, HM is Horseman, and there is plays, which is self explanatory. So, 5th Horseman plays.

Edited June 2, 2018 by The Minmus Derp
@5thHorseman

21 minutes ago, The Minmus Derp said:

Wait. V is 5, HM is Horseman, and there is plays, which is self explanatory. So, 5th Horseman plays.

Yup.
I right!

7 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:

Wait. V is 5, HM is Horseman, and there is plays, which is self explanatory. So, 5th Horseman plays.

I have never realized that there were actual letters on @5thHorseman's pic. I always thought it was just a really stylized logo!

 

I chose my profile picture because I noticed that some of the more colorful pics tend to be blurred - I'm guessing because of file size limitations - so I wanted a minimalist one so it would look clean. And I happen to like Calvin and Hobbes.
I like Calvin and Hobbes too!,!!!!1!,!!!,!!1!one!,

I usually use dog pictures on my profiles, even on my computers.

So, when creating this profile, choosing Laika (the first dog in space) was kind of a no choice.

Now and then I consider how her mission had gone and what I do on KSP. It's silly, but I try hard not to blow up Kerbals. Without the slighest trace of success - Kerbal's Heaven is a overcrowded place.
forgot I meant to change it

Hmm...

A cepholopod with my name on most accounts or just the yellow cepholopod.

Pretty self explanatory.

My avatar is one of the most horrifying toys ever coming out of the deepest, darkest pits of hell: A toy monkey banging cymbals together while grinning like a mad.. um.. ape... Why? Because the sheer uglyness of it had me laughing out loud when I saw it and 1, I'm not against laughing out loud, 2, I can appreciate someone making a din for the hell of it and 3, I am a sucker for absurdities and that toy is about the most absurd I have ever seen.
